description: S73 application to vary Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) imposed under planning permission 2020/4098 relating to erection of part three and part four-storey building plus basement to provide office (Use Class E) floorspace following demolition of existing building on site (decision notice dated 08/12/2021) to allow for minor design changes (various).
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification and
a drainage layout of at least one&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">suitable sustainable drainage systems (i.e. water butt,
rain garden, bio-retention planter box,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">living roof (substrate depth of 80-150mm excluding the
vegetative mat), permeable paving&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved in writing by
the local planning authority, If&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are
used, an infiltration test must be&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is
suitable for infiltration. It must be&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface
water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate
and volume for all return periods up to the 1 in 100 year storm events plus an
allowance for climate change. The approved sustainable drainage&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">system shall be installed in accordance with the approved
details and thereafter retained and</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">maintained.<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">&nbsp;</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">REASON: To reduce surface water run-off from the site and
in the interests of promoting&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">sustainable urban drainage.</span></p>
